wiki.content:
The 1999 song is presented as a series of letters to the porn star Chasey Lain from a fan.
 It was written because of Jimmy Pop's fascination with her.
 
 The song shares its melody with "Sea of Sin" by Jimmy Pop's favorite band Depeche Mode.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary:
The 1999 song is presented as a series of letters to the porn star Chasey Lain from a fan.
 It was written because of Jimmy Pop's fascination with her.  The song shares its melody with "Sea of Sin" by Jimmy Pop's favorite band Depeche Mode.
